branchName.$: University Library of Southern Denmark - Odense University Library

openingHours.$:
Mandag-torsdag 8.00-19.00, fredag 08.00-16.00, lørdag 10.00-15.00.
I perioden 1.7 - 31.8 mandag-fredag 08.00-16.00, onsdag 08.00-18.00, lørdag lukket.
Biblioteket er lukket grundlovsdag, juleaftens- og nytårsaftensdag.
På dagen for universitetets årsfest lukkes kl. 12.00.
Særlige åbningstider i forbindelse med helligdage, se:  http://www.sdu.dk/bibliotek

Monday-Thursday 8 am to 7 pm, Friday 8 am to 4 pm, Saturday 10 am to 3 pm. During the period 1.7 - 31.8: Monday, Tuesday, Thursday, Friday 8 am to 4 pm, Wednesday 8 am to 6 pm, Saturday closed. 
The library is closed on June 5th, Christmas Eve and New Year´s Eve.
On the University Commemoration Day the library will close at 12 am.
Special opening hours in connection with holidays, see: http://www.sdu.dk/bibliotek

illOrderReceiptText.$: Bestilling videresendes til det bibliotek, der ejer materialet, senest 5 åbningsdage efter modtagelse af denne bestilling. Herefter kan der gå fra 5 dage og opefter, inden materialet kan afhentes, afhængigt af om materialet allerede er udlånt.

Your request will be handled within 5 opening days. 
Deliverance time will depend on the lending library and can be expected to exceed 10 days.
